Description:
Innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.

Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

Allies that survive player combat have a 2% chance to create a Doot. Bard always creates a Doot when dancing.

Each Doot you collect increases your Shop odds for higher-tier champions by 1%.
level_1: Each Doot you collect increases your Shop odds for higher-tier champions by 1%.

Description: Your team gains bonus maximum Health. Bruisers gain double this bonus.
Every 5th attack fires a cannon shot that explodes for physical damage around the target.

Innate: Charge quickly towards their target whenever they move.

Cavaliers gain Armor and Magic Resist. At the start of combat and after each charge, gain double the amount for 4 seconds.
(1) Dragons provide +3 to the marked trait, but require 2 team slots. They also gain 700 bonus Health.This trait is active with exactly 1 Dragon champion.
level_1: Dragons provide +3 to the marked trait, but require 2 team slots. They also gain 700 bonus Health.

Description: Use the Dragonmancer Blessing item to choose a Hero. The Hero gains massively increased Health and Ability Power, which increases by 20% per star level of your Dragonmancers.
Evokers gain Mana whenever an ally or enemy casts an Ability.
Once per combat at 50% Health, Guardians shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their maximum Health. Shields stack!
(3) Each combat: An adjacent ally sacrifices their life to the Legend, which gains 100% of their Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance, plus 40% of their Ability Power.
level_1: (3) Each combat: An adjacent ally sacrifices their life to the Legend, which gains 100% of their Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance, plus 40% of their Ability Power.

Description: Mages cast twice and have modified total Ability Power.
(1) Nab a new Ability after each cast and at the start of every round.
level_1: (1) Nab a new Ability after each cast and at the start of every round.

Description: 1) The first Starcaller to cast their Ability during player combat heals you for (2/3/75), depending on their star level. Excess healing disintegrates an enemy champion.
level_1: 1) The first Starcaller to cast their Ability during player combat heals you for (2/3/75), depending on their star level. Excess healing disintegrates an enemy champion.

Description:
Innate: gain 2 hex Attack Range.

Swhiftshots gain Attack Speed for each hex between themselves and their target.
Warrior attacks have a 33% chance to increase the damage of their next attack.
Swhiftshots gain Attack Speed for each hex between themselves and their target.
